content.text: Redesign this and make it responsive to all devices. Use different gsap animation for this.
Redesign this and make it responsive to all devices. Use different gsap animation for this.

I'll help you redesign the wwd-cards component to be more responsive and replace the Framer Motion animations with GSAP animations. Let me first examine the current code and then create an improved version.
Let me check the package.json to see what dependencies are available and if GSAP is already installed:
Great! GSAP is already installed. Now let me check the tailwind config to understand the responsive breakpoints:
Now let me check the translation file to understand the structure of the content:
Let me see more of the translation file to find the whatwedoContent:
Now let me check the public/index.ts to see the image imports:

Perfect! Now I have all the information I need. Let me create a redesigned version of the wwd-cards component with GSAP animations and improved responsiveness. I'll create a more modern, clean design with better mobile optimization.
Now let me replace the JSX return section with the new responsive design:

content.lineBasedDiff:
--- components/wwd-cards.tsx +++ components/wwd-cards.tsx @@ -205,223 +205,106 @@ }; return ( - <> -
- -
-
-

- {t("title1")} -

-

- {t("heading1")} - -
- {t("heading2")} -

-

- {t("para1")} -

-
-
- - {t("href1")} - +
+ {cardData.map((card, index) => ( +
addToRefs(el, index, 'card')} + className="w-full max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8" + > +
+
+ {/* Content Section */}
+ ref={(el) => addToRefs(el, index, 'content')} + className="flex-1 p-6 sm:p-8 md:p-12 lg:p-16 xl:p-20 flex flex-col justify-center" + > +
+ {/* Title */} +
+

+ {card.title} +

+ + {/* Main Heading */} +

+ {card.heading1} +
+ {card.heading2} +

+
+ + {/* Description */} +

+ {card.para} +

+ + {/* CTA Link */} +
+ + + {card.href} + +
+ +
+
+
+ + {/* Image Section */} +
+
addToRefs(el, index, 'image')} + className="relative w-full max-w-md lg:max-w-lg xl:max-w-xl" + > +
+ + + {/* Overlay gradient for better visual appeal */} +
+
+ + {/* Decorative elements */} +
+
+
+
- - - - -
-
- -
-
-

content.text: Perfect! Now let me test the component to make sure it works correctly by running the development server:
